5 Tips To Grow As New Twitter User

Start Gaining Traction


You signed up for a Twitter account.

Then you followed some great people.

What do you do now? Great that you ask.

Let’s get started.

  1. Pick 2-3 Topics to Tweet About
    Before you start tweeting, you should know your topics you will tweet about.

    This will be your niche. You niche will set you apart.

    Your first topic should be something you can talk about for 30 minutes without stopping.

    The 2nd and 3rd topics are not as important.

    But they should compliment the 1st one.

    Too many topics and people are less likely to follow you.

  2. Add value to larger accounts
    Engaging with others posts is where things will start to flow.

    This helps other users see your profile.

    Other users will start seeing your comments.

    Then eventually follow you.

  3. Post 3 times daily
    It is necessary to post daily before growth will start.

    When someone comes to your profile, they need to see what you are about.

    3 posts per day is all you need. Remember to stay on topic.

  4. Retweet 5-10 times per day
    Retweets add content to your page you didn’t come up with.

    They allow you to push more value to your followers.

    A good amount is 5 - 10 daily. Make sure they are spread out.

    You don’t want to push to many tweets at once.

  5. Quote Tweet 3 times per day
    Quote tweets are another great way to have content with little thought.

    All you have to do is retweet and then add you spin to the post.

    This can be an extension of their thought.

    Or a differing opinion. Completely up to you.

  6. Bonus Tip: Schedule Tweets
    Since, I like you. I’m adding another tip.

    Scheduling tweets is the best way post 3 tweets daily.

    Some days you’ll have a ton of ideas.

    Some you won’t. For the days you don’t scheduling will save you.

    There are tools to help schedule.

    Twitter has one built in.

    And there is one called Tweetdeck.

    Personally I use (affilliate link) Hypefury.

    HypeFury allows me to schedule and automatically retweet on a schedule.

    The link above will get you a free trial.

    Once you try it out, you won’t use anything else.

Conclusion

Follow the tips above and you will start to see growth.

The more you practice the better you will get.
